translated: Next, explain the mudras and altar methods.

original: 1 身印身印第一「反叉二小指、二無名指，在掌中右壓左，二頭指直竪，頭相拄，以二中指各㧙在二頭指背上，頭相拄，二大指並竪，各博頭指側，大指來去。🔽2 頭印頭印第二「准前身印，各屈二中指上節頭向大指垂，甲相背，即是頭印。
analyzed: 1 身印身印第一「反叉二小指、二無名指，在掌中右壓左，二頭指直竪，頭相拄，以二中指各㧙在二頭指背上，頭相拄，二大指並竪，各博頭指側，大指來去。 2 頭印頭印第二「准前身印，各屈二中指上節頭向大指垂，甲相背，即是頭印。
translated: Body mudra, first: Interlock the two little fingers and ring fingers in the palm, with the right pressing down on the left, the two index fingers straight up touching each other, the two middle fingers each bent to touch the backs of the two index fingers, the two thumbs parallel and straight up, each touching the sides of the index fingers, with the thumbs moving back and forth.🔽Head mudra, second: Same as the previous body mudra, bend the two middle fingers at the second joint, with the tips hanging down towards the thumbs, the nails touching but backs not touching, this is the head mudra.

original: 3 頂印頂印第三「准前身印，唯改二大指屈上節，頭入掌中，即是頂印。
analyzed: 3 頂印頂印第三「准前身印，唯改二大指屈上節，頭入掌中，即是頂印。
translated: Crown mudra, third: Same as the previous body mudra, only change the two thumbs bent at the second joint, with the tips entering the palm, this is the crown mudra.

original: 「若比丘欲行遠道，於袈裟中裹像；
analyzed: 「若比丘欲行遠道，於袈裟中裹像；
translated: If a bhikṣu wishes to travel far, wrap the image in his kasaya robe;

original: 若俗人，頭髻中著像，即作此頭頂印以安像頭上，二十一遍誦呪行道，所至之處無有怖畏。
analyzed: 若俗人，頭髻中著像，即作此頭頂印以安像頭上，二十一遍誦呪行道，所至之處無有怖畏。
translated: If a layperson places an image in their topknot, they should make this head-touching mudrā and place it on the head of the image, recite the mantra twenty-one times while circumambulating, and go to the place where there is no fear.

original: 4 護身印護身印第四「准前身印，惟改開二頭指二分許，即是護身印，用之護身。
analyzed: 4 護身印護身印第四「准前身印，惟改開二頭指二分許，即是護身印，用之護身。
translated: Body-guarding Mudrā, Fourth The same as the previous body mudrā, only change the two index fingers to open about two inches apart, and this is the body-guarding mudrā, use it to guard the body.

original: 5 歡喜印歡喜印第五「左手大指頭壓無名指第一節文，又以餘四指把拳，即是歡喜印。
analyzed: 5 歡喜印歡喜印第五「左手大指頭壓無名指第一節文，又以餘四指把拳，即是歡喜印。
translated: Joyful Mudrā, Fifth The tip of the left thumb presses on the third joint of the ring finger, and the remaining four fingers form a fist, this is the joyful mudrā.

original: 若作此印誦呪，羅闍及沱屈邊者即前人歡喜。
analyzed: 若作此印誦呪，羅闍及沱屈邊者即前人歡喜。
translated: If one makes this mudrā and recites the mantra, the people on the side of the king and the ministers will be joyful.

original: 6 摩奴印摩奴印第六「左手屈臂，掌向於胸前，以頭指已下四指把拳，以大指壓頭指甲上，少開掌中作孔。
analyzed: 6 摩奴印摩奴印第六「左手屈臂，掌向於胸前，以頭指已下四指把拳，以大指壓頭指甲上，少開掌中作孔。
translated: Manu Mudrā, Sixth Bend the left arm, with the palm facing the chest, and with the index finger and the remaining four fingers form a fist, press the thumb on top of the fingernail, slightly open the palm to form a hole.

original: 以右手甲掌，從左手節上向手掌摩之，到於孔上即以右手覆蓋孔上。
analyzed: 以右手甲掌，從左手節上向手掌摩之，到於孔上即以右手覆蓋孔上。
translated: With the nails of the right hand, rub from the wrist of the left hand towards the palm, reaching the opening, then cover the opening with the right hand.

original: 心想念之：
analyzed: 心想念之：
translated: Mentally visualize and think:

original: 『左手掌是摩利支心，右手掌是摩利支身，於左手掌心中我身藏隱，在摩利支天心內斯文藏我身，著摩利支在我頂上護我身此是好知印。
analyzed: 『左手掌是摩利支心，右手掌是摩利支身，於左手掌心中我身藏隱，在摩利支天心內斯文藏我身，著摩利支在我頂上護我身此是好知印。
translated: 'The palm of the left hand is the heart of Marici, the palm of the right hand is the body of Marici. I hide my body in the heart of the palm of the left hand, in the heart of Marici. This text hides my body in the heart of Marici, protecting my body on top of my head. This is the good knowledge mudra.'

original: 』7 使者印使者印第七「以左手四指屈，以大指捻二中指頭，使作孔，以右手指於左臂腋下，不覆手，五指並展，誦呪七遍，即以此手合左孔上。
analyzed: 』7 使者印使者印第七「以左手四指屈，以大指捻二中指頭，使作孔，以右手指於左臂腋下，不覆手，五指並展，誦呪七遍，即以此手合左孔上。
translated: The messenger mudra, the messenger mudra, seventh: 'Bend the four fingers of the left hand, and pinch the tips of the two middle fingers with the thumb, making a hole. With the right hand, point to the armpit of the left arm, do not cover the hand, and spread the five fingers. Recite the mantra seven times, then cover the hole of the left hand with this hand.

original: 呪曰：
analyzed: 呪曰：
translated: The mantra says:

original: 「『那謨摩唎支曳一　薩婆薩埵二　阿咥唎沙哩三　莎訶四』」佛語：
analyzed: 「『那謨摩唎支曳一　薩婆薩埵二　阿咥唎沙哩三　莎訶四』」佛語：
translated: 'Namo Mariciye, Sarvasattva, Atite Shari, Svaha.' The Buddha said:

original: 「諸持呪行者，若欲專求是摩利支天法、覓諸利益現神驗者，依前誦呪滿遍數已，臘月十五日作受法壇。
analyzed: 「諸持呪行者，若欲專求是摩利支天法、覓諸利益現神驗者，依前誦呪滿遍數已，臘月十五日作受法壇。
translated: Those who practice dhāraṇīs, if they wish to exclusively seek the method of this Marīci Heaven and seek all benefits and manifest spiritual responses, they should recite the mantra as before until the number of recitations is fulfilled, and on the fifteenth day of the twelfth month, set up an initiation altar.

original: 「若欲作壇，預於其月十一日旦覓知好處，修理其地，除去惡物一如上法，堅築平正，即作護身結界法事。
analyzed: 「若欲作壇，預於其月十一日旦覓知好處，修理其地，除去惡物一如上法，堅築平正，即作護身結界法事。
translated: If you wish to set up an altar, on the eleventh day of that month, find a good place, repair the ground, remove bad objects as in the above method, firmly level it, and then perform the rites of protecting oneself and establishing the boundary.

original: 「若作護身，預起是月從十一日，日別一遍誦呪三遍，依前印法以護自身，三遍結界。
analyzed: 「若作護身，預起是月從十一日，日別一遍誦呪三遍，依前印法以護自身，三遍結界。
translated: If you wish to protect yourself, from the eleventh day of this month, recite the mantra three times each day, and use the previous mudrā method to protect your own body, and establish the boundary three times.

original: 其結界法還用以前護身印法，作印誦呪，至五遍竟，以印右轉即成結界。
analyzed: 其結界法還用以前護身印法，作印誦呪，至五遍竟，以印右轉即成結界。
translated: The method of establishing the boundary is to use the previous mudrā method for protecting the body. Perform the mudrā and recite the mantra until it is recited five times, and then turn the mudrā to the right to establish the boundary.

original: 至十四日晨朝更作一大結界，呪灰七遍遣於四方，為結內界。
analyzed: 至十四日晨朝更作一大結界，呪灰七遍遣於四方，為結內界。
translated: On the morning of the fourteenth day, establish a large boundary again, and recite the mantra over ashes seven times to send it in the four directions to establish the inner boundary.

original: 又作泥團，數滿十枚，一一各呪一七遍已，擲著八方及上下方，是名大結界。
analyzed: 又作泥團，數滿十枚，一一各呪一七遍已，擲著八方及上下方，是名大結界。
translated: Also make ten mud balls, each chanting the mantra seven times, and throw them in the eight directions and above and below. This is called the great boundary-marking.

original: 如此結界護已，即取香水和土作泥遍塗壇地。
analyzed: 如此結界護已，即取香水和土作泥遍塗壇地。
translated: After marking the boundary in this way, take perfumed water, mix it with soil to make mud, and smear it all over the altar ground.

original: 「立道場已，懸諸幡蓋、種種寶物。
analyzed: 「立道場已，懸諸幡蓋、種種寶物。
translated: Having established the ritual arena, hang various banners, canopies, and precious objects.

original: 以五色線繞壇四面已，次將少分香華入道場中，燒香作印，喚摩利支天供養行道，然後發遣。
analyzed: 以五色線繞壇四面已，次將少分香華入道場中，燒香作印，喚摩利支天供養行道，然後發遣。
translated: Use five-colored strings to encircle the altar on all four sides, then take a small amount of incense and flowers into the ritual arena, burn incense, form the mudra, summon Marishiten, make offerings, practice circumambulation, and then dismiss [the deity].

original: 「至十五日晨朝，更取淨牛糞和香水泥泥道場地，更結界已，又用種種名香和水兼少淨土更塗壇地一遍，待乾，取五色粉遍布壇地，極令莊嚴。
analyzed: 「至十五日晨朝，更取淨牛糞和香水泥泥道場地，更結界已，又用種種名香和水兼少淨土更塗壇地一遍，待乾，取五色粉遍布壇地，極令莊嚴。
translated: On the morning of the fifteenth day, take clean cow dung, mix it with perfumed water, smear the ground of the ritual arena with mud, mark the boundary again, and further mix various famous incense with water and a small amount of clean soil to smear the altar ground once more. Wait for it to dry, take the five-colored powder, spread it all over the altar ground, and make it extremely magnificent.

original: 「作四肘壇，其壇中心作蓮華座，於其座上即安摩利支天之像。
analyzed: 「作四肘壇，其壇中心作蓮華座，於其座上即安摩利支天之像。
translated: Make a four-cubit altar, in the center of the altar make a lotus flower seat, and on the seat place an image of Marici.

original: 東面安置使者之座，名婆多羅室唎夜；
analyzed: 東面安置使者之座，名婆多羅室唎夜；
translated: On the east side place a messenger's seat named Bhadrapada;

original: 南面安置使者之座，名摩利儞；
analyzed: 南面安置使者之座，名摩利儞；
translated: on the south side place a messenger's seat named Marici;

original: 北面復安使者座處，名計室儞；
analyzed: 北面復安使者座處，名計室儞；
translated: on the north side again place a messenger's seat named Kshitigarbha;

original: 西門安置呪師坐處。
analyzed: 西門安置呪師坐處。
translated: at the west gate place the seat for the mantra master to sit.

original: 至夜然燈二十五盞，將五水罐——中心一罐，四角各一——安置罐竟，種種香、華、餅果、飲食而為供養，莊嚴水罐如餘部說。
analyzed: 至夜然燈二十五盞，將五水罐——中心一罐，四角各一——安置罐竟，種種香、華、餅果、飲食而為供養，莊嚴水罐如餘部說。
translated: At night, light twenty-five lamps, and take five water jars - one in the center and one in each of the four corners - when the jars are placed, make offerings of various incense, flowers, cakes, fruits, and food, and adorn the water jars as explained in other sections.

original: 「安置種種諸供具竟，呪師坐青草上，然後作印喚摩利支天等，以作其印種種供養。
analyzed: 「安置種種諸供具竟，呪師坐青草上，然後作印喚摩利支天等，以作其印種種供養。
translated: When the various offerings are set out, the mantra master sits on green grass, and then makes a mudra to summon Marici and the others, and with the mudra makes various offerings.

original: 及出壇外，將諸飲食散施一切諸鬼神等。
analyzed: 及出壇外，將諸飲食散施一切諸鬼神等。
translated: And after coming out of the altar, take the food and drink and scatter them to all the ghosts and spirits.

original: 散施竟已，呪師手把青草誦呪，以草從頭向脚摩之，一百八遍作護身印。
analyzed: 散施竟已，呪師手把青草誦呪，以草從頭向脚摩之，一百八遍作護身印。
translated: After scattering them, the mantra master holds green grass in his hand and recites the mantra, using the grass to rub from head to toe one hundred and eight times, making the body protection mudra.

original: 於其印中又把青草向頂上著，遣一弟子將壇中心水罐灌受法人頭頂印上。
analyzed: 於其印中又把青草向頂上著，遣一弟子將壇中心水罐灌受法人頭頂印上。
translated: In the mudra, he also holds green grass and places it on the crown of the head. He sends a disciple to pour the water jar from the center of the altar on the head and mudra of the person receiving the Dharma.

original: 與灌頂竟，著新淨衣，將入道場與作護身，一心念佛禮拜摩利支天之像。
analyzed: 與灌頂竟，著新淨衣，將入道場與作護身，一心念佛禮拜摩利支天之像。
translated: After the consecration, wearing new clean clothes, he is brought into the ritual arena to have his body protected. Single-mindedly contemplating the Buddha, he bows to the image of Marishiten.

original: 「作是法壇，呪師自身、受法弟子惟食粳米、乳粥為食。
analyzed: 「作是法壇，呪師自身、受法弟子惟食粳米、乳粥為食。
translated: In performing this Dharma altar, the mantra master himself and the disciple receiving the Dharma only eat rice and milk porridge as food.

original: 「事訖發遣，於後掃除壇處，泥塗摒當總竟，獻殘飲食，呪師自身受法弟子皆不得食。
analyzed: 「事訖發遣，於後掃除壇處，泥塗摒當總竟，獻殘飲食，呪師自身受法弟子皆不得食。
translated: After the matter is finished and dismissed, later sweep the altar site, plaster it, and completely finish it. Offer the remaining food and drink. The mantra master himself and the disciple receiving the Dharma are not allowed to eat.

original: 「作是法已，然後行用，一切大驗。
analyzed: 「作是法已，然後行用，一切大驗。
translated: After performing this Dharma, then use it. All will have great efficacy.

original: 初欲受法證効驗者，必須作壇及其手印；
analyzed: 初欲受法證効驗者，必須作壇及其手印；
translated: First, those who wish to receive the Dharma and experience its efficacy must make an altar and its hand seals;

original: 若不如是，徒喪其功。
analyzed: 若不如是，徒喪其功。
translated: if it is not done like this, it will be in vain.

original: 「且作水壇，淨治一室，牛糞塗地，方圓一肘、或二肘、或四肘，中心安摩利支像。
analyzed: 「且作水壇，淨治一室，牛糞塗地，方圓一肘、或二肘、或四肘，中心安摩利支像。
translated: Make a water altar, purify a room, smear the ground with cow dung, one cubit square, or two cubits, or four cubits, and place an image of Marici in the center.

original: 「行者日日洒浴——若不洒浴者，應當洒手漱口入道場。
analyzed: 「行者日日洒浴——若不洒浴者，應當洒手漱口入道場。
translated: The practitioner should bathe daily - if not bathing, they should wash their hands and rinse their mouth before entering the ritual arena.

original: 呪師在此壇西坐，正面向東，喚摩利支安置壇中，燒安悉香及諸好香種種供養。
analyzed: 呪師在此壇西坐，正面向東，喚摩利支安置壇中，燒安悉香及諸好香種種供養。
translated: The mantra master sits to the west of the altar, facing east, summoning Marici to be placed in the altar, burning asps incense and various fine incense for various offerings.

original: 日日誦呪，一坐一百八遍、或一千八遍、若一萬八千遍。
analyzed: 日日誦呪，一坐一百八遍、或一千八遍、若一萬八千遍。
translated: Recite the mantra daily, one hundred and eight times per sitting, or one thousand and eight times, or one hundred and eight thousand times.

original: 呪師以手撮取胡麻、粳米相和，於壇前著火爐中燒，一撮一呪燒，如是滿一百八遍、一千八遍，心心相續，勿緣餘事。
analyzed: 呪師以手撮取胡麻、粳米相和，於壇前著火爐中燒，一撮一呪燒，如是滿一百八遍、一千八遍，心心相續，勿緣餘事。
translated: The mantra practitioner should take sesame and rice mixed together, place them in a brazier in front of the altar, burn them, reciting the mantra once for each pinch, like this, filling one hundred and eight times or one thousand and eight times, with mind continuously focused, not thinking of other things.

original: 從月一日至十五日隨力供養飲食、酥蜜、乳酪、果、華、香、燈明，惟除酒肉五辛，欲滿十萬遍倍加供養，如是乃至足十萬遍竟。
analyzed: 從月一日至十五日隨力供養飲食、酥蜜、乳酪、果、華、香、燈明，惟除酒肉五辛，欲滿十萬遍倍加供養，如是乃至足十萬遍竟。
translated: From the first day of the month until the fifteenth day, make offerings of food and drink, ghee, honey, milk, curds, fruits, flowers, incense, and lamps according to your ability, except for alcohol, meat, and the five pungent vegetables. If you wish to complete one hundred thousand recitations, make offerings twice as much. Do this until you have completed one hundred thousand recitations.

original: 然後於好處所撩理於地，拔却惡物、瓦礫、骨、毛等已，堅築於地，使平坦之。
analyzed: 然後於好處所撩理於地，拔却惡物、瓦礫、骨、毛等已，堅築於地，使平坦之。
translated: Then, in a good place, level the ground, remove bad objects such as tiles, pebbles, bones, and hair, and firmly tamp the ground to make it flat.

original: 「作此壇日者，臘月十五日為勝，又法庚子日、正月一日，餘月取建日為始。
analyzed: 「作此壇日者，臘月十五日為勝，又法庚子日、正月一日，餘月取建日為始。
translated: The day to make this altar, the fifteenth day of the twelfth month is the best. Another method is to take the gengzi day or the first day of the first month, and for other months, take the beginning day of the month as the start.

original: 以五色作壇，壇之中心著摩利支座，上遺五色粉而作華座并形或印。
analyzed: 以五色作壇，壇之中心著摩利支座，上遺五色粉而作華座并形或印。
translated: Make an altar with five colors. In the center of the altar, place a seat for Mārajit, on which place five-colored powder to make a flower seat and form or seal.

original: 東面著使者，名婆多羅室利夜；
analyzed: 東面著使者，名婆多羅室利夜；
translated: On the east side, place the messenger named Bhadrasri;

original: 北面著使者，名計室儞；
analyzed: 北面著使者，名計室儞；
translated: On the north side, place the messenger named Kshitigarbha;

original: 南面著使者，名摩利儞。
analyzed: 南面著使者，名摩利儞。
translated: On the south side, place the messenger named Marici.

original: 「然後呪師從摩利支至摩利儞次第喚之，各隨本座而安置之。
analyzed: 「然後呪師從摩利支至摩利儞次第喚之，各隨本座而安置之。
translated: Then the mantra practitioner, from Mārajit to Marici, should call them in order and place them on their respective seats.

original: 安置既竟，當以香華飲食八盤、十六盞燈，倍勝於前種種供養已，呪師在西門外，面向東坐，誦呪一千八遍，種種供養。

analyzed: 「如其作上諸事不遂心者，呪者即知定有障難，即於白月、若黑月，或八日、或十五日，牛糞塗地，設飲食華果，燒安悉香，取白線呪之，一遍一結，如是作四十九結繫之左臂，所有障難鬼神盡皆被縛，更不得作障難以下本法。
translated: If the above things are not accomplished as wished, the mantra practitioner will know that there are definitely obstacles. Then, on the bright or dark fortnight, on the eighth or fifteenth day, smear the ground with cow dung, set out food, drink, flowers, and fruits, burn anāsa incense, take white thread, chant over it once, tie a knot once, do this forty-nine times, and tie it on the left arm. All obstacles and ghosts will be completely bound, and will not be able to create obstacles again. Below is the original method.

original: 「若人欲行東西，遠行在路者，先作水壇，喚摩利支天安置，取稻穀華和酥蜜，火燒一千八遍并誦呪，隨欲趣處去者大吉，得大靈驗。
analyzed: 「若人欲行東西，遠行在路者，先作水壇，喚摩利支天安置，取稻穀華和酥蜜，火燒一千八遍并誦呪，隨欲趣處去者大吉，得大靈驗。
translated: If a person wishes to travel east or west, on a long journey, first make a water altar, summon Marichirati and place her, take rice flowers mixed with ghee and honey, burn them in the fire one thousand and eight times while reciting the mantra. Whoever goes to the desired destination will have great good fortune and obtain great spiritual efficacy.

original: 「又更有法，七日之中日日作水壇，喚摩利支天安置。
analyzed: 「又更有法，七日之中日日作水壇，喚摩利支天安置。
translated: There is also another method, for seven days, make a water altar each day, summon Marichirati and place her.

original: 復著火爐，然穀木火，於其火中燒粳米、胡麻一百八遍，并誦呪。
analyzed: 復著火爐，然穀木火，於其火中燒粳米、胡麻一百八遍，并誦呪。
translated: Again, place in a fire pit, burn rice and firewood in the fire, burn rice and sesame one hundred and eight times in the fire, and recite the mantra.

original: 日日三時，時別一百八遍，乃至七日作此法竟，向囉闍及臣邊者前人喜歡。
analyzed: 日日三時，時別一百八遍，乃至七日作此法竟，向囉闍及臣邊者前人喜歡。
translated: Three times a day, one hundred and eight times each time, up to seven days. After completing this method, the person in front of the king and ministers will be delighted.

original: 「更有法，若欲論義，依前法火燒梨枝一百八段，段別一尺，并呪，如是七日作此法者，得大聰明論師。
analyzed: 「更有法，若欲論義，依前法火燒梨枝一百八段，段別一尺，并呪，如是七日作此法者，得大聰明論師。
translated: There is also another method. If you wish to debate, according to the previous method, burn one hundred and eight pieces of pear wood, each piece one foot long, and recite the mantra. By doing this method for seven days, you will become a great scholar with sharp intellect.

original: 「又法，欲往山中，依前法火燒蘇一百八遍并呪去者，一切禽獸、毒蟲不得侵害。
analyzed: 「又法，欲往山中，依前法火燒蘇一百八遍并呪去者，一切禽獸、毒蟲不得侵害。
translated: Moreover, if one wishes to go to the mountains, rely on the previous method, burn ghee in the fire one hundred and eight times along with the mantra of the one who goes, then all birds, beasts, and poisonous insects will not be able to harm.

original: 「又法，若人欲得見摩利支者，依前法，以穀木柴然火，取天木香二十一段，以酥蜜、酪塗之，火燒并呪二十一遍。
analyzed: 「又法，若人欲得見摩利支者，依前法，以穀木柴然火，取天木香二十一段，以酥蜜、酪塗之，火燒并呪二十一遍。
translated: Moreover, if a person wishes to see Māli, rely on the previous method, burn firewood from grain trees in the fire, take twenty-one sections of heavenly wood incense, smear them with ghee, honey, and curds, burn them in the fire along with the mantra twenty-one times.

original: 日日惟喫粳米、飯、乳酪三種，不得食餘物，七日之中日日倍勝種種供養。
analyzed: 日日惟喫粳米、飯、乳酪三種，不得食餘物，七日之中日日倍勝種種供養。
translated: Day after day, only eat three kinds of food: rice, milk, and curds. Do not eat other things. For seven days, make offerings that are increasingly excellent day by day.

analyzed: 如是七日作此法時，於第七日摩利支身現入道場，問行者言： 『某甲！
translated: When performing this method for seven days, on the seventh day, Māli's body appears and enters the ritual arena, and asks the practitioner, 'So-and-so!

original: 汝今欲求何願？
analyzed: 汝今欲求何願？
translated: What wish do you now seek?

original: 』是時行者隨意答之，時摩利支聽許，與願歸去者，即知得驗，諸天歡喜。
analyzed: 』是時行者隨意答之，時摩利支聽許，與願歸去者，即知得驗，諸天歡喜。
translated: ' At that time, the practitioner answers according to their wishes. When Māli grants permission and fulfills the wish, the one who returns immediately knows that they have obtained verification, and the gods rejoice.

original: 「又法，七日之中，日日三時火燒槐香草、白菖蒲、白芥子三種，并呪已，向囉闍邊去，前人歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，七日之中，日日三時火燒槐香草、白菖蒲、白芥子三種，并呪已，向囉闍邊去，前人歡喜。
translated: Furthermore, for seven days, three times a day, burn pine incense, white calamus, and white mustard seeds in the fire, and recite the mantra. Then go to the king's side, and the person in front will be delighted.

original: 「又法，欲向官人邊去者，依前法，火燒白芥子，日日三時，時別一百八遍并呪，七日惟食粳米、乳、酪三種，不得食餘物，如是七日訖，向官人邊者，前人歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，欲向官人邊去者，依前法，火燒白芥子，日日三時，時別一百八遍并呪，七日惟食粳米、乳、酪三種，不得食餘物，如是七日訖，向官人邊者，前人歡喜。
translated: Furthermore, if you wish to go to the side of an official, follow the previous method, burn white mustard seeds in the fire, three times a day, one hundred and eight times each time, and recite the mantra. For seven days, only eat rice, milk, and curds, three kinds, and do not eat other things. After seven days like this, if you go to the side of the official, the person in front will be delighted.

original: 「又欲依前法，火燒梨葉日日三時，時別一百八遍并呪，如是滿七日者，治一切鬼病時大得驗。
analyzed: 「又欲依前法，火燒梨葉日日三時，時別一百八遍并呪，如是滿七日者，治一切鬼病時大得驗。
translated: Furthermore, if you wish to follow the previous method, burn pear leaves in the fire, three times a day, one hundred and eight times each time, and recite the mantra. After seven days like this, it cures all ghost illnesses and is very effective.

original: 「又法依前，取大麥好去皮，擣細篩為末，以蜜和作團，大如李子，一百八箇。
analyzed: 「又法依前，取大麥好去皮，擣細篩為末，以蜜和作團，大如李子，一百八箇。
translated: Furthermore, follow the previous method, take barley, remove the husks, grind it into fine powder, mix it with honey to make balls, the size of a plum, one hundred and eight pieces.

original: 七日之中，行者初日全不喫食，其餘六日任意食之。
analyzed: 七日之中，行者初日全不喫食，其餘六日任意食之。
translated: For seven days, the practitioner does not eat at all on the first day, and may eat as they wish for the remaining six days.

original: 日日火燒所搏大麥，并呪一百八遍，作上歡喜印。
analyzed: 日日火燒所搏大麥，并呪一百八遍，作上歡喜印。
translated: Day after day, burn the barley dough over the fire, and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times, making the above joyful mudra.

analyzed: 如是盡燒一百八團訖，以水滅火，於其烟上熏兩手掌，誦呪二十一遍，願云：
translated: In this way, when burning one hundred and eight portions is finished, extinguish the fire with water, fumigate both palms with the smoke, recite the mantra twenty-one times, and make the wish:

original: 『使我之手作一切法成種種得驗。
analyzed: 『使我之手作一切法成種種得驗。
translated: 'May my hands accomplish all dharmas and various efficacious methods.'

original: 』者，一切得驗，前人歡喜。
analyzed: 』者，一切得驗，前人歡喜。
translated: Then all efficacious methods will be accomplished, and the other person will be joyful.

original: 「又法，依前燒阿末羅葉一百八遍并誦呪者，療一切鬼病，呪即得差。
analyzed: 「又法，依前燒阿末羅葉一百八遍并誦呪者，療一切鬼病，呪即得差。
translated: Furthermore, following the previous method, burn one hundred and eight āmalaka leaves while reciting the mantra. This will cure all ghost illnesses, and the mantra will immediately be effective.

original: 「又法，若人熱病，取好青草擬口，誦呪二十一遍，以摩病者五十四遍并呪者即差。
analyzed: 「又法，若人熱病，取好青草擬口，誦呪二十一遍，以摩病者五十四遍并呪者即差。
translated: Furthermore, if someone has a fever, take some good green grass, recite the mantra twenty-one times, and rub it on the patient fifty-four times while reciting the mantra. They will then be cured.

original: 「又法，日日三時誦呪一遍、三遍，作大護身；
analyzed: 「又法，日日三時誦呪一遍、三遍，作大護身；
translated: Furthermore, recite the mantra three times a day, once or three times, to greatly protect the body;

original: 三遍，作大結界；
analyzed: 三遍，作大結界；
translated: three times, to greatly establish a boundary;

original: 五遍誦呪者，所愛摩奴沙任意即得；
analyzed: 五遍誦呪者，所愛摩奴沙任意即得；
translated: if one recites the mantra five times, one can obtain any man or woman one desires;

original: 六遍誦呪，護身結界，夜入塚墓一切不畏。
analyzed: 六遍誦呪，護身結界，夜入塚墓一切不畏。
translated: if one recites the mantra six times, it protects the body and establishes a boundary, and one need not fear anything when entering a charnel ground at night.

original: 「又法，若欲遠行，先於私房七遍火燒熏陸香并呪者，著道之時數數誦呪行者，路中若逢賊難、鬼難等皆不得近，悉自離人。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲遠行，先於私房七遍火燒熏陸香并呪者，著道之時數數誦呪行者，路中若逢賊難、鬼難等皆不得近，悉自離人。
translated: Furthermore, if one wishes to travel far, first burn incense in a private room seven times, and then recite the mantra while wearing it on the road. If one encounters bandits, ghosts, or other difficulties on the road, they will all be unable to approach and will naturally leave the person.

original: 「又法，依前白月八日於淨室中，取好香華與粳米飯少少，火燒誦呪一千八遍。
analyzed: 「又法，依前白月八日於淨室中，取好香華與粳米飯少少，火燒誦呪一千八遍。
translated: Furthermore, following the previous method, on the eighth day of the bright fortnight, in a clean room, take good incense, flowers, and a small amount of rice, burn them in the fire, and recite the mantra one thousand and eight times.

original: 行者一日不食，著淨潔衣。
analyzed: 行者一日不食，著淨潔衣。
translated: The practitioner should fast for one day and wear clean clothes.

original: 作此法去者，前人尊重恭敬供養，一切鬼神亦皆敬畏。
analyzed: 作此法去者，前人尊重恭敬供養，一切鬼神亦皆敬畏。
translated: If one performs this method, the other person will respect, honor, and make offerings, and all ghosts and spirits will also be in awe.

original: 「又法，取牛糞——未落地時以器承取來，莫令著地——即用和水而作水壇，其壇中心著佛像或佛舍利。
analyzed: 「又法，取牛糞——未落地時以器承取來，莫令著地——即用和水而作水壇，其壇中心著佛像或佛舍利。
translated: Furthermore, take cow dung - before it falls to the ground, receive it with a vessel, do not let it touch the ground - then mix it with water to make a water altar. In the center of the altar, place a Buddha image or Buddha relics.

original: 搆取母犢并黃牛乳作蘇，宬金盋中，以右手無名指攪之於酥，并呪。
analyzed: 搆取母犢并黃牛乳作蘇，宬金盋中，以右手無名指攪之於酥，并呪。
translated: Take the mother cow and a yellow milk cow to make ghee, store it in a golden bowl, and stir it with the ring finger of the right hand, along with the mantra.

original: 其蘇之上火若出者，即應自知得大聰明；
analyzed: 其蘇之上火若出者，即應自知得大聰明；
translated: If fire arises on the ghee, then one should know for oneself that one will attain great intelligence;

original: 一日誦千偈，若火不出，唯烟與暖者，小小聰明；
analyzed: 一日誦千偈，若火不出，唯烟與暖者，小小聰明；
translated: if one recites a thousand verses in one day, if there is no fire, only smoke and warmth, then one will have slight intelligence;

original: 若不得烟暖者，自身伏地，擬口於酥器邊，以右手無名指為箸喫酥，即得少少聰明。
analyzed: 若不得烟暖者，自身伏地，擬口於酥器邊，以右手無名指為箸喫酥，即得少少聰明。
translated: if one does not obtain smoke or warmth, one should lie down on the ground, bring one's mouth to the edge of the ghee vessel, use the ring finger of the right hand as a spoon to eat the ghee, and one will attain slight intelligence.

original: 「又法，於城東外好撩理地作四肘壇，取塼坏五箇，中心著一，四面各一。
analyzed: 「又法，於城東外好撩理地作四肘壇，取塼坏五箇，中心著一，四面各一。
translated: Furthermore, outside the east of the city, on well-groomed ground, make a four-cubit altar, take five bricks, place one in the center and one on each of the four sides.

original: 又以四水罐宬水，以柳枝塞口，於四面塼坏上著之。
analyzed: 又以四水罐宬水，以柳枝塞口，於四面塼坏上著之。
translated: Also, fill four water jars with water, cover the mouths with willow branches, and place them on brick mounds at the four sides.

original: 又取紫檀磨研水中，即以其水灑於壇上。
analyzed: 又取紫檀磨研水中，即以其水灑於壇上。
translated: Also, take purple sandalwood, grind it into water, and sprinkle it on the altar.

original: 復以赤華供養於壇，復以胡烟脂四枚各著四水罐邊，復以五色線繞壇四面，壇四面外以種種香華飲食祭潑與諸鬼神。
analyzed: 復以赤華供養於壇，復以胡烟脂四枚各著四水罐邊，復以五色線繞壇四面，壇四面外以種種香華飲食祭潑與諸鬼神。
translated: Again, offer red flowers to the altar, and place four pieces of frankincense next to the four water jars. Also, wrap the altar with five-colored thread on all four sides. Outside the four sides of the altar, offer various incense, flowers, and food to the ghosts and spirits.

original: 於壇西門敷青草座，呪師著好淨衣，結加趺坐於青草上，喚摩利支及諸使者，安置種種供養。
analyzed: 於壇西門敷青草座，呪師著好淨衣，結加趺坐於青草上，喚摩利支及諸使者，安置種種供養。
translated: On the west side of the altar, spread a seat of green grass. The mantra master puts on clean, nice clothes, sits cross-legged on the green grass, summons Mārajit and the messengers, and arranges various offerings.

original: 「呪師手把青草誦呪，以草從自頂向脚摩之，一百八遍。
analyzed: 「呪師手把青草誦呪，以草從自頂向脚摩之，一百八遍。
translated: The mantra master holds green grass in his hand, recites the mantra, and rubs the grass from the top of his head to his feet 108 times.

original: 呪師手作摩利支身印，印中把青草向自頂著，遣一弟子將壇上以四水罐一一灌於呪師頂上竟，然後呪師著好淨衣，作護身印，念佛禮佛。
analyzed: 呪師手作摩利支身印，印中把青草向自頂著，遣一弟子將壇上以四水罐一一灌於呪師頂上竟，然後呪師著好淨衣，作護身印，念佛禮佛。
translated: The mantra master uses the Marici body mudra to hold green grass and touch it to his crown. He sends a disciple to use the four water jars on the altar to pour water over the mantra master's head. Then the mantra master puts on clean clothes, makes the body protection mudra, and recites the Buddha's name and pays homage to the Buddha.

original: 禮摩利支訖，取龍華與龍腦香及酥合香三種，七日之中，呪師惟食粳米、牛乳、粥，不得喫餘物，日日呪於上三種藥一百八遍，乃至第七日將彼藥按自頂上右肩、左肩、心上、咽上、額上者得驗，此語不開。
analyzed: 禮摩利支訖，取龍華與龍腦香及酥合香三種，七日之中，呪師惟食粳米、牛乳、粥，不得喫餘物，日日呪於上三種藥一百八遍，乃至第七日將彼藥按自頂上右肩、左肩、心上、咽上、額上者得驗，此語不開。
translated: After paying homage to Marici, he takes dragon flower, dragon brain incense, and ghee incense, and for seven days, the mantra master only eats white rice, cow's milk, and porridge, not eating anything else. He recites the mantra one hundred and eight times each day over the above three kinds of medicine, until the seventh day. He presses the medicine on his crown, right shoulder, left shoulder, heart, throat, and forehead. This method is effective, and the words cannot be changed.

original: 「又法，依前，若人患痔病，取黑線作呪索，令其病者頭東脚西臥於床上，以上呪索繫病者腰，又以別呪索繫其床脚并呪，如是作此法并呪二十一遍者，痔病即差。
analyzed: 「又法，依前，若人患痔病，取黑線作呪索，令其病者頭東脚西臥於床上，以上呪索繫病者腰，又以別呪索繫其床脚并呪，如是作此法并呪二十一遍者，痔病即差。
translated: Furthermore, the method is the same as before. If someone suffers from hemorrhoids, take a black thread to make a spell rope, have the patient lie on a bed with their head east and feet west, tie the spell rope around the patient's waist, and also tie it to the bed legs with another spell rope. If one performs this method and recites the spell twenty-one times, the hemorrhoids will be cured.

original: 「又法，若人患頸，治法如上，惟改前繫腰索繫其頸上為異。
analyzed: 「又法，若人患頸，治法如上，惟改前繫腰索繫其頸上為異。
translated: Furthermore, if someone suffers from a neck ailment, the treatment method is the same as above, only changing from tying the rope around the waist to tying it around the neck.

original: 「又法，人家鬼神、暴亂、疫病、死亡不息，又求上善事不獲所願者，取江水兩邊泥土以作一百鬼形像。
analyzed: 「又法，人家鬼神、暴亂、疫病、死亡不息，又求上善事不獲所願者，取江水兩邊泥土以作一百鬼形像。
translated: Furthermore, if a family has ghosts and spirits causing chaos, epidemic diseases, and deaths without end, and also seeks good things but does not obtain what they wish, take mud from both sides of a river to make one hundred ghost effigies.

original: 其中鬼王名毘那夜迦，此鬼王頭者作白象頭形，其餘諸鬼頭各別作諸禽獸形，其身手脚總作人形，大小可長四指、或八指許作之。
analyzed: 其中鬼王名毘那夜迦，此鬼王頭者作白象頭形，其餘諸鬼頭各別作諸禽獸形，其身手脚總作人形，大小可長四指、或八指許作之。
translated: Among them, the ghost king named Vinayaka, this ghost king's head is shaped like a white elephant's head, the heads of the other ghosts are each made into the shapes of various birds and beasts, their bodies, hands, and feet are all made in the form of a human, and they are made to be four fingers or eight fingers long.

original: 取紫檀木於水研之，用以其水和泥，塗於地作壇。
analyzed: 取紫檀木於水研之，用以其水和泥，塗於地作壇。
translated: Take sandalwood wood and grind it in water, use that water to mix with the mud, and apply it to the ground to make an altar.

original: 以五色土於壇之上作鬼坐處，中心一座、北面二座、南面二座、東面二座、西面一座。
analyzed: 以五色土於壇之上作鬼坐處，中心一座、北面二座、南面二座、東面二座、西面一座。
translated: Use five-colored soil to make a place for the ghosts on the altar, one seat in the center, two seats on the north side, two seats on the south side, two seats on the east side, and one seat on the west side.

original: 於中心座上著於鬼王像，其餘六座總分著九十九鬼像。
analyzed: 於中心座上著於鬼王像，其餘六座總分著九十九鬼像。
translated: Place the image of the ghost king on the central seat, and distribute the images of the ninety-nine ghosts on the remaining six seats.

original: 以諸香華及燈、七盞酥燈、諸飲食等種種供養，并取安悉香和酥火燒用以供養。
analyzed: 以諸香華及燈、七盞酥燈、諸飲食等種種供養，并取安悉香和酥火燒用以供養。
translated: Make various offerings such as incense, flowers, lamps, seven oil lamps, and various food and drink, and also take guggul incense mixed with ghee to burn in the fire as an offering.

original: 「呪師坐於西門，面向東，誦摩利支呪七遍，以五種色線呪二十一遍。
analyzed: 「呪師坐於西門，面向東，誦摩利支呪七遍，以五種色線呪二十一遍。
translated: The mantra master sits at the west gate, facing east, recites the Marici mantra seven times, and enchants a five-colored thread twenty-one times.

original: 然後取壇中三面諸鬼像聚於中心鬼王邊，一處著之，以其五色線總縛著彼百鬼像訖，取犢子糞一百八摶，一一火燒并呪。
analyzed: 然後取壇中三面諸鬼像聚於中心鬼王邊，一處著之，以其五色線總縛著彼百鬼像訖，取犢子糞一百八摶，一一火燒并呪。
translated: Then, gather the images of the ghosts from the three sides of the altar in the center next to the ghost king, put them in one place, and bind all the one hundred ghosts with the five-colored thread. Take one hundred and eight balls of calf dung, and enchant and burn each one.

original: 燒一一摶時一誦呪莎訶，於先唱云：
analyzed: 燒一一摶時一誦呪莎訶，於先唱云：
translated: When burning each ball, recite the mantra and Svaha once. First chant:

original: 『縛一切鬼。
analyzed: 『縛一切鬼。
translated: 'Bind all ghosts.

original: 』然後云：
analyzed: 』然後云：
translated: ' Then say:

original: 『莎訶。
analyzed: 『莎訶。
translated: 'Svaha.'

original: 』「如是，人人盡一百八摶竟，然後別掘地深至人腰，作孔，將彼所縛諸鬼像并壇飲食著於孔中，以諸香華種種飲食供養彼鬼，然後以土塞於孔上，平地，後永不出。
analyzed: 』「如是，人人盡一百八摶竟，然後別掘地深至人腰，作孔，將彼所縛諸鬼像并壇飲食著於孔中，以諸香華種種飲食供養彼鬼，然後以土塞於孔上，平地，後永不出。
translated: In this way, each person finishes one hundred and eight balls, then dig a hole in the ground to the depth of the waist, put the bound ghost images and the altar food and drink into the hole, make offerings of various incense, flowers, and food to the ghosts, then fill the hole with soil, level the ground, and they will never come out again.

original: 「若呪師業病臨死之時，心中作放，彼鬼得脫。
analyzed: 「若呪師業病臨死之時，心中作放，彼鬼得脫。
translated: If the mantra practitioner's illness is at the point of death, they should mentally release [the spirit], and the ghost will be freed.

original: 若作此法，即得摩利支來，速疾大驗。
analyzed: 若作此法，即得摩利支來，速疾大驗。
translated: If this method is performed, Mārajit will come quickly with great efficacy.

original: 「復次，於前水壇誦呪了，不共人語，即入房內臥。
analyzed: 「復次，於前水壇誦呪了，不共人語，即入房內臥。
translated: Furthermore, after reciting the mantra at the water altar in front, do not speak with others, and then enter the room to lie down.

original: 或於夜中得異境界，勿向人說，惟師弟子二人評論善惡；
analyzed: 或於夜中得異境界，勿向人說，惟師弟子二人評論善惡；
translated: Or in the middle of the night, one may have unusual experiences, but do not speak of them to others; only the teacher and disciple, two people, can discuss the good and bad;

original: 滿十萬遍後若無境界，取稻穀華和胡麻，燒如前法；
analyzed: 滿十萬遍後若無境界，取稻穀華和胡麻，燒如前法；
translated: After completing one hundred thousand recitations, if there are no experiences, take rice grains and sesame seeds, burn them as before;

original: 亦無境界，更不須飲食，惟散華誦呪，每至八日、十五日、二十三日隨呪師所食奉上，連續誦呪，自責懺悔，必得如願。
analyzed: 亦無境界，更不須飲食，惟散華誦呪，每至八日、十五日、二十三日隨呪師所食奉上，連續誦呪，自責懺悔，必得如願。
translated: If there are still no experiences, do not eat or drink, only scatter flowers and recite the mantra. Every eighth, fifteenth, and twenty-third day, according to what the mantra practitioner eats, offer it up, continue reciting the mantra, and self-critically repent, and you will surely attain your wish.

original: 從初三七日後，一七日一度試呪力，方知漸進。
analyzed: 從初三七日後，一七日一度試呪力，方知漸進。
translated: After the first twenty-one days, every seven days test the power of the mantra once, and then know the gradual progress.

original: 「又法，一生之中，日日惟食粳米乳粥，數數誦呪，得大聰明，四姓之中婆羅門大愛念；
analyzed: 「又法，一生之中，日日惟食粳米乳粥，數數誦呪，得大聰明，四姓之中婆羅門大愛念；
translated: Furthermore, in one's life, eating only rice gruel with milk every day, reciting the mantra many times, one will attain great intelligence and be greatly loved by the Brahmins among the four castes;

original: 若火燒酥酪乳者，剎利愛念；
analyzed: 若火燒酥酪乳者，剎利愛念；
translated: If the fire burns ghee, curd, and milk, the Kshatriyas will love it;

original: 若火燒大麥酪乳者，毘舍愛念；
analyzed: 若火燒大麥酪乳者，毘舍愛念；
translated: If the fire burns barley, curd, and milk, the Vaishyas will love it;

original: 若火燒胡麻滓者，首陀愛念。
analyzed: 若火燒胡麻滓者，首陀愛念。
translated: If the fire burns sesame dregs, the Shudras will love it.

original: 「又法，若人鬼病口合不語者，呪水二十一遍，七遍㧊入之即語。
analyzed: 「又法，若人鬼病口合不語者，呪水二十一遍，七遍㧊入之即語。
translated: Furthermore, if a person has a ghost illness and their mouth is closed and they cannot speak, recite the mantra over water twenty-one times, and sprinkle it on them seven times, they will then speak.

original: 「又法，鬼病口合不語者，以袈裟角誦呪二十一遍，打之即語。
analyzed: 「又法，鬼病口合不語者，以袈裟角誦呪二十一遍，打之即語。
translated: Furthermore, if a person has a ghost illness and their mouth is closed and they cannot speak, recite the mantra over the corner of a kasaya robe twenty-one times and strike them with it, and they will then speak.

original: 「又法，右手以大指、無名指捻灰，呪之七遍，四方散之，即成結界。
analyzed: 「又法，右手以大指、無名指捻灰，呪之七遍，四方散之，即成結界。
translated: Furthermore, pinch some ashes with the thumb and ring finger of the right hand, recite the mantra over them seven times, and scatter them in the four directions, and it will then form a boundary.

original: 「又法，以泥作丸，丸為十箇，各擲一方作大結界，隨擲遠近即成界量。
analyzed: 「又法，以泥作丸，丸為十箇，各擲一方作大結界，隨擲遠近即成界量。
translated: Furthermore, make mud balls, ten in total, and throw them in the ten directions to form a great boundary, the size of the boundary following the distance thrown.

original: 「又法，若婦人難產，呪胡麻油七遍以摩臍上，即得生兒。
analyzed: 「又法，若婦人難產，呪胡麻油七遍以摩臍上，即得生兒。
translated: Furthermore, if a woman has difficulty giving birth, chant over sesame oil seven times and rub it on her navel, and she will give birth to a child.

original: 「又法，若共論義得勝時被他相瞋、一候相言、又共他鬪諍被他相言、枷鎖官邊問罪是非時，取白昌蒲呪二十一遍，右臂繫之，以左手作歡喜印并呪去之者，即得大勝之理。
analyzed: 「又法，若共論義得勝時被他相瞋、一候相言、又共他鬪諍被他相言、枷鎖官邊問罪是非時，取白昌蒲呪二十一遍，右臂繫之，以左手作歡喜印并呪去之者，即得大勝之理。
translated: Furthermore, if you win in a debate and are resented by others, if you have a dispute with someone and are argued with by others, or if you are questioned about right and wrong in the presence of officials with shackles, take white reed and chant over it twenty-one times, tie it to your right arm, make the joyful mudra with your left hand and chant while removing it, and you will obtain the principle of great victory.

original: 若數數誦呪，種種得驗。
analyzed: 若數數誦呪，種種得驗。
translated: If you chant the mantra repeatedly, you will obtain various verifications.

original: 「又法，若人被毒蟲螫者，呪師取五色線作呪索二十一結并呪，以繫自右臂上訖，向被螫人邊去，取柳枝呪之，數數以手摩彼人即差。
analyzed: 「又法，若人被毒蟲螫者，呪師取五色線作呪索二十一結并呪，以繫自右臂上訖，向被螫人邊去，取柳枝呪之，數數以手摩彼人即差。
translated: Moreover, if someone is bitten by a poisonous insect, the spell-master should take five-colored thread to make a spell rope with twenty-one knots and spells, tie it on his own right arm, go to the side of the bitten person, take a willow branch and chant spells over it, and repeatedly rub the person with his hand, and they will be cured.

original: 「又法，若人被惡毒蛇所螫，臨欲死時，呪師以自手掬取水，擬口七遍誦呪，以其水潑於病者二十一遍并呪即差。
analyzed: 「又法，若人被惡毒蛇所螫，臨欲死時，呪師以自手掬取水，擬口七遍誦呪，以其水潑於病者二十一遍并呪即差。
translated: Moreover, if someone is bitten by a vicious poisonous snake and is about to die, the spell-master should scoop up water with his own hand, chant the spell over it seven times, and sprinkle it on the patient twenty-one times while chanting the spell, and they will be cured.

original: 「又法，若火燒蘇一百八遍并呪，一切禽狩毒蟲不得侵害。
analyzed: 「又法，若火燒蘇一百八遍并呪，一切禽狩毒蟲不得侵害。
translated: Moreover, if ghee is burned one hundred and eight times while chanting the spell, no poisonous insects or beasts can harm it.

original: 「又法，若人身生惡瘡者，黃土和泥，於瘡上二十一遍并呪即差。
analyzed: 「又法，若人身生惡瘡者，黃土和泥，於瘡上二十一遍并呪即差。
translated: Moreover, if someone has an evil sore on their body, mixing yellow earth with mud, chanting the spell over it twenty-one times, and applying it to the sore will cure it.

original: 「又法，若畜生遇時氣病者，於城村坊正中央然穀木柴火，以牛乳火燒并呪即差夜作此法。
analyzed: 「又法，若畜生遇時氣病者，於城村坊正中央然穀木柴火，以牛乳火燒并呪即差夜作此法。
translated: Moreover, if a livestock encounters a seasonal illness, in the center of the city, village, or ward, burn chaff and firewood, and burn with cow's milk and the mantra, it will be cured. Do this method at night.

original: 其明日午時還然穀木柴火，取白芥子油與白芥子相和，火燒一千八遍并呪者，即大差。
analyzed: 其明日午時還然穀木柴火，取白芥子油與白芥子相和，火燒一千八遍并呪者，即大差。
translated: The next day at noon, again burn chaff and firewood, take white mustard seeds and white mustard seeds, mix them together, and burn them in the fire one thousand and eight times with the mantra, and the illness will be greatly cured.

original: 「又法，取具嚧陀木一千八段此木似菩提樹，一各呪已，呪一遍火中燒盡，一切鳩盤荼、藥叉等鬼神皆悉歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，取具嚧陀木一千八段此木似菩提樹，一各呪已，呪一遍火中燒盡，一切鳩盤荼、藥叉等鬼神皆悉歡喜。
translated: Moreover, take one thousand and eight pieces of kṛtamāla wood (this wood is similar to the bodhi tree), enchant each piece once, and burn it all up in the fire while reciting the mantra once. All kumbhāṇḍa and yakṣa ghosts and spirits will be delighted.

original: 「又法，若火燒冬瓜少少，一千八遍并呪者，一切魍魎皆悉歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，若火燒冬瓜少少，一千八遍并呪者，一切魍魎皆悉歡喜。
translated: Moreover, if one burns a small piece of winter melon one thousand and eight times with the mantra, all goblins will be delighted.

original: 「又法，若取塚墓之樹木一千八段與胡麻相和，火燒一千八遍并呪者，一切大惡鬼神歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，若取塚墓之樹木一千八段與胡麻相和，火燒一千八遍并呪者，一切大惡鬼神歡喜。
translated: Furthermore, if one takes a thousand and eight pieces of wood from a charnel ground, mixes them with sesame seeds, burns them in a fire a thousand and eight times along with the mantra, all the great evil ghosts and spirits will be delighted.

original: 「又法，若取菩提樹枝一千八段，一一塗酥，火燒一千八遍并呪者，四大天王歡喜愛念。
analyzed: 「又法，若取菩提樹枝一千八段，一一塗酥，火燒一千八遍并呪者，四大天王歡喜愛念。
translated: Furthermore, if one takes a thousand and eight branches from a bodhi tree, anoints each with ghee, burns them in a fire a thousand and eight times along with the mantra, the Four Heavenly Kings will be delighted and cherish [the practitioner].

original: 「又法，若癲病者，呪師取一切五穀相和，以手掬取，呪之火燒，如是一千八遍者，鬼神歡喜，即得治病。
analyzed: 「又法，若癲病者，呪師取一切五穀相和，以手掬取，呪之火燒，如是一千八遍者，鬼神歡喜，即得治病。
translated: Furthermore, if one who is suffering from epilepsy takes all five kinds of grains, scoops them up with one's hand, recites the mantra over them and burns them in a fire a thousand and eight times, the ghosts and spirits will be delighted and the illness will be cured.

original: 「又法，若取安悉香擣之為丸，塗酥，火燒一千八遍并呪者，摩醯首羅及傍邊天一切歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，若取安悉香擣之為丸，塗酥，火燒一千八遍并呪者，摩醯首羅及傍邊天一切歡喜。
translated: Furthermore, if one takes uśīra incense, grinds it into pills, anoints them with ghee, burns them in a fire a thousand and eight times along with the mantra, Maheśvara and all the gods around him will be delighted.

original: 「若依前法，作水壇種種供養，壇中心著佛像或佛舍利，取囉迦沙彌陀木此是菩提樹之別名三千八段，與酪酥蜜中塗之，一一火燒，各一段一呪，如是盡三千八段。
analyzed: 「若依前法，作水壇種種供養，壇中心著佛像或佛舍利，取囉迦沙彌陀木此是菩提樹之別名三千八段，與酪酥蜜中塗之，一一火燒，各一段一呪，如是盡三千八段。
translated: If you rely on the previous method, make a water altar, make various offerings, place a Buddha image or Buddha relics in the center of the altar, take raksha shamita wood (this is an alternate name for the Bodhi tree) in three thousand and eight segments, smear it with curds, ghee, and honey, burn each segment in the fire with a mantra, like this until all three thousand and eight segments are finished.

original: 作此法者，滅除行者五逆四重罪而得清淨，亦得呪驗。
analyzed: 作此法者，滅除行者五逆四重罪而得清淨，亦得呪驗。
translated: If you perform this method, you will eliminate the practitioner's sins of the five heinous crimes and the four grave offenses and attain purity, and you will also obtain the efficacy of the mantra.

original: 「又法，若行者依前法作水壇等，從白月八日至十五日，日日取紫橿木一千八段，一一塗酥并呪火燒者，摩利支天即來入道場，遂其所願。
analyzed: 「又法，若行者依前法作水壇等，從白月八日至十五日，日日取紫橿木一千八段，一一塗酥并呪火燒者，摩利支天即來入道場，遂其所願。
translated: Furthermore, if the practitioner relies on the previous method to make a water altar, etc., from the eighth day to the fifteenth day of the bright half of the month, take purple sandalwood wood in one thousand and eight segments each day, smear each with ghee and burn it in the fire with a mantra, then the Marici deity will come and enter the ritual arena, fulfilling one's wishes.

original: 行者眼見摩利支身，得大靈驗；
analyzed: 行者眼見摩利支身，得大靈驗；
translated: The practitioner will see the body of Marici with the eyes and obtain great spiritual efficacy;

original: 若其不來，要心懺悔，渴仰於摩利支天，一日不食，作種種供養者，必來現身，得摩利支種種大驗。
analyzed: 若其不來，要心懺悔，渴仰於摩利支天，一日不食，作種種供養者，必來現身，得摩利支種種大驗。
translated: If it does not come, one should repent with utmost sincerity, yearn for Mārajit, fast for one day, and make various offerings. It will definitely come and manifest its body, and one will obtain various great responses from Mārajit.

original: 「又法，若欲得錢財者，黑月十四日至十五日兩日之中，日別三時取胡麻、粳米、稻穀華三種火燒并呪一百八遍者，即得錢財，稱心如意。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲得錢財者，黑月十四日至十五日兩日之中，日別三時取胡麻、粳米、稻穀華三種火燒并呪一百八遍者，即得錢財，稱心如意。
translated: Another method, if one wishes to obtain wealth, during the two days from the fourteenth to the fifteenth day of the dark half of the month, at each of the three times, take sesame, rice, and paddy flowers, burn them in fire, and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times. One will then obtain wealth, and it will be as one wishes.

original: 「又法，若欲得縛魔者，七日之中日日取苦楝樹枝——一本云菩提樹枝——一千八段，一一塗於白芥子油，呪一遍火中燒者即得縛魔。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲得縛魔者，七日之中日日取苦楝樹枝——一本云菩提樹枝——一千八段，一一塗於白芥子油，呪一遍火中燒者即得縛魔。
translated: Another method, if one wishes to bind a demon, during seven days, each day take branches of neem tree (one text says bodhi tree branches), one thousand and eight pieces, each smeared with white mustard seed oil, recite the mantra once and burn it in fire. One will then be able to bind the demon.

original: 「又法，若呪師或俗人行此呪法時，被比止搦，將去枷鎖縛，數數誦此呪者，縛永不得。🔽「又法，若欲得闍囉迦者，七日之中，日日三時取名香擣之為丸，一千八箇，一一塗酥，并呪燒去者，即得如意。🔽「又法，若人相瞋，取胡麻油滓和粳米糠，火燒一千八遍并呪者，前人歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，若呪師或俗人行此呪法時，被比止搦，將去枷鎖縛，數數誦此呪者，縛永不得。 「又法，若欲得闍囉迦者，七日之中，日日三時取名香擣之為丸，一千八箇，一一塗酥，并呪燒去者，即得如意。 「又法，若人相瞋，取胡麻油滓和粳米糠，火燒一千八遍并呪者，前人歡喜。
translated: Moreover, if the mantra practitioner or layperson performing this mantra method is restrained, taken away, shackled, or bound, if they recite this mantra frequently, the bonds will never be able to restrain them.🔽 Moreover, if one wishes to subdue someone, for seven days, three times a day, take fragrant incense, pound it into pills, one thousand and eight, each smeared with ghee, and burn them while reciting the mantra, one will be able to subdue them as desired.🔽 Moreover, if two people are angry with each other, take sesame oil residue and mix it with rice bran, burn it in the fire one thousand and eight times while reciting the mantra, and the other person will become delighted.

original: 「又法，若取胡麻火燒一千八遍并呪者，前人愛念歡喜。
analyzed: 「又法，若取胡麻火燒一千八遍并呪者，前人愛念歡喜。
translated: Moreover, if one takes sesame seeds and burns them in the fire one thousand and eight times while reciting the mantra, the other person will love and be delighted with them.

original: 「又法，若欲得錢財者，七日之中日日取古淄草一本云固漏草，莖長六指，一千八段，一一火燒并呪者，即得錢財。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲得錢財者，七日之中日日取古淄草一本云固漏草，莖長六指，一千八段，一一火燒并呪者，即得錢財。
translated: Moreover, if one wishes to obtain money and wealth, for seven days, take a piece of old straw each day, one says it is a solid leak grass, six fingers long, one thousand and eight pieces, burn each one in fire together with the mantra, and one will obtain money and wealth.

original: 「又法，若欲向他索所愛物者，取白菖蒲呪之一千八遍，繫自臂上，去從乞之無所不得。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲向他索所愛物者，取白菖蒲呪之一千八遍，繫自臂上，去從乞之無所不得。
translated: Moreover, if one wishes to ask others for their beloved possessions, take white calamus and recite the mantra one thousand and eight times, tie it to one's arm, go and beg for it, and one will obtain whatever is not given.

original: 「又法，三七二十一日，日日三時取安悉香擣之為丸，一千八箇，用塗酪酥蜜中，一一火燒并呪者，向囉闍及官人邊去之，前人歡喜愛念。
analyzed: 「又法，三七二十一日，日日三時取安悉香擣之為丸，一千八箇，用塗酪酥蜜中，一一火燒并呪者，向囉闍及官人邊去之，前人歡喜愛念。
translated: Moreover, for twenty-one days, three times a day, take asafetida and grind it into pills, one thousand and eight, use ghee, butter, and honey to smear each one, burn it in fire together with the mantra, and go before the king and officials, the person in front will be delighted and love you.

original: 「又法，若欲得作立羅奴斯者梵音此云綱維，七日之中，日日三時取眾名香擣之為丸，一千八箇，一一塗酥火燒并呪者，即得如願。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲得作立羅奴斯者梵音此云綱維，七日之中，日日三時取眾名香擣之為丸，一千八箇，一一塗酥火燒并呪者，即得如願。
translated: Moreover, if one wishes to become a Rāṣṭrapāla (meaning 'leader' in Sanskrit), for seven days, three times a day, one should take various famous incense powders, make them into pills, one thousand and eight, and burn each one in ghee and recite the mantra. One will then attain as one wishes.

original: 「又法，若行者洒浴，入道場，作水壇等種種供養，喚摩利支天安置，日日誦呪，如是滿十萬遍，一七日中無有斷絕。
analyzed: 「又法，若行者洒浴，入道場，作水壇等種種供養，喚摩利支天安置，日日誦呪，如是滿十萬遍，一七日中無有斷絕。
translated: Moreover, if the practitioner bathes, enters the ritual arena, makes a water altar, and makes various offerings, summoning and placing Mārichi Heaven, reciting the mantra daily in this way for a full one hundred thousand times, without interruption for one seven-day period,

original: 作此法訖，然後口云結界，一聲即成——莫作手印及呪灰等——隨行者願皆得成就，一切難事不近其身，能破他人作法之事他人、惡人、外道等也，由是天呪神力自在致令如是。
analyzed: 作此法訖，然後口云結界，一聲即成——莫作手印及呪灰等——隨行者願皆得成就，一切難事不近其身，能破他人作法之事他人、惡人、外道等也，由是天呪神力自在致令如是。
translated: after completing this ritual, then say 'establish the boundary' once, and it will be accomplished - do not make the hand seal or recite the mantra over ashes, etc. - whatever the practitioner wishes will all be accomplished, and all difficult matters will not approach their body, and they will be able to destroy the ritual activities of others - other people, evil people, non-Buddhists, etc. - this is due to the power of the heavenly mantra being sovereign, causing it to be so.

original: 」爾時，摩利支天白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時，摩利支天白佛言：
translated: At that time, Marici Devi said to the Buddha:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我有別法，今欲說之。
analyzed: 我有別法，今欲說之。
translated: I have another method that I now wish to explain.

original: 「用紫檀木廣三指、長三寸，其木一面刻作摩利支像，似天女形。
analyzed: 「用紫檀木廣三指、長三寸，其木一面刻作摩利支像，似天女形。
translated: Use sandalwood wood, three fingers wide and three inches long, and carve the image of Marici on one side of the wood, resembling the form of a celestial maiden.

original: 其像左右各刻作摩利支侍者，亦似天女形。
analyzed: 其像左右各刻作摩利支侍者，亦似天女形。
translated: On the left and right of the image, also carve attendants of Marici, also resembling the form of celestial maidens.

original: 復以別紫檀木作蓋，蓋之於像。
analyzed: 復以別紫檀木作蓋，蓋之於像。
translated: Also use separate sandalwood wood to make a cover and cover the image.

original: 作此像已，欲行遠道，將於此像不離自身隱著藏之，莫令人知，數數誦呪。
analyzed: 作此像已，欲行遠道，將於此像不離自身隱著藏之，莫令人知，數數誦呪。
translated: After making this image, if you wish to travel far, take this image and keep it close to your body, hidden and concealed, so that no one knows, and recite the mantra repeatedly.

original: 「若有所願，即作水壇，壇中心安像，喚摩利支安置，以種種供養。
analyzed: 「若有所願，即作水壇，壇中心安像，喚摩利支安置，以種種供養。
translated: If you have a wish, then make a water altar, place the image in the center of the altar, summon Marici and place it there, and make various offerings.

original: 復取蓮華一百八箇以供養之。
analyzed: 復取蓮華一百八箇以供養之。
translated: Also take one hundred and eight lotus flowers to offer to it.

original: 其供養法，手取一一蓮華一一呪之，用以供養。
analyzed: 其供養法，手取一一蓮華一一呪之，用以供養。
translated: The method of making offerings is to take each lotus flower and recite the mantra over it one by one, and use it to make offerings.

original: 復以胡麻、粳米，火燒一千八遍并呪訖，把像行時種種得驗。
analyzed: 復以胡麻、粳米，火燒一千八遍并呪訖，把像行時種種得驗。
translated: Moreover, burn sesame and rice over a fire one thousand and eight times, along with the mantra, and hold the image when walking. Various signs of success will be obtained.

original: 」注云：
analyzed: 」注云：
translated: The commentary states:

original: 上件諸法皆作水壇等種種供養，如得驗也。
analyzed: 上件諸法皆作水壇等種種供養，如得驗也。
translated: The above-mentioned methods are all performed at a water altar, with various offerings, and when signs of success are obtained.

original: 上來所言并呪者，隨其物數一一呪燒，名并呪也。
analyzed: 上來所言并呪者，隨其物數一一呪燒，名并呪也。
translated: As for the above-mentioned 'along with the mantra', it means to chant and burn each item according to its number, which is called 'along with the mantra'.

original: 時摩利支說此法竟，世尊印可：
analyzed: 時摩利支說此法竟，世尊印可：
translated: When Marici had finished speaking this method, the World-Honored One approved:

original: 「善哉，善哉！
analyzed: 「善哉，善哉！
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: 汝今所說，我亦隨喜，以能利益諸眾生故。
analyzed: 汝今所說，我亦隨喜，以能利益諸眾生故。
translated: I also rejoice in what you have said now, because it can benefit all sentient beings.

original: 」佛說是經已，告諸比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷、國王、大臣、及諸人民等：
analyzed: 」佛說是經已，告諸比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷、國王、大臣、及諸人民等：
translated: After the Buddha had spoken this sutra, he told the bhikshus, bhikshunis, upasakas, upasikas, kings, ministers, and all the people:

original: 「聞佛說是摩利支天陀羅尼，一心受持之者，是人不為一切諸惡所害。
analyzed: 「聞佛說是摩利支天陀羅尼，一心受持之者，是人不為一切諸惡所害。
translated: If one hears the Buddha speak this Marici-devi Dharani and single-mindedly receives and upholds it, this person will not be harmed by any evil.

original: 諸比丘若有人能書寫、讀誦、受持之者，若著髻中、若著衣中隨身而行，一切諸惡悉皆退散，無敢當者。
analyzed: 諸比丘若有人能書寫、讀誦、受持之者，若著髻中、若著衣中隨身而行，一切諸惡悉皆退散，無敢當者。
translated: If any bhikṣus are able to write, recite, and uphold it, if they wear it in their topknot or on their body, all evil will retreat and scatter, and none will dare to confront them.

original: 」是諸四眾、天龍八部禮佛而退，歡喜奉行。
analyzed: 」是諸四眾、天龍八部禮佛而退，歡喜奉行。
translated: The fourfold assembly and the eight groups of beings bowed to the Buddha and withdrew, joyfully upholding and practicing it.

original: 摩利支天經一卷。
analyzed: 摩利支天經一卷。
translated: The Sūtra of Marīci Heaven, in one fascicle.

original: 功德天法一卷功德天法一卷中天竺國菩提寺僧阿難律木叉師、迦葉師等共瞿多法師於經行寺翻，流行於唐國。
analyzed: 功德天法一卷功德天法一卷中天竺國菩提寺僧阿難律木叉師、迦葉師等共瞿多法師於經行寺翻，流行於唐國。
translated: The Dharma of the Goddess of Blessings, in one fascicle. The Dharma of the Goddess of Blessings, in one fascicle. The monks Ānanda and Kāśyapa, the Vinaya masters and Dharma masters, together with Dharma Master Guda, translated this at the Temple of the Strolling Monks, and it circulated in the Tang state.

original: 爾時，功德天女白佛言：
analyzed: 爾時，功德天女白佛言：
translated: At that time, the Goddess of Blessings addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 學此法者，我當隨其所須之物——衣服、飲食、臥具、醫藥、及餘資產——供給是人，無所乏少。
analyzed: 學此法者，我當隨其所須之物——衣服、飲食、臥具、醫藥、及餘資產——供給是人，無所乏少。
translated: For those who study this Dharma, I will provide them with whatever they need - clothing, food and drink, bedding, medicine, and other necessities - so that they will lack nothing.

original: 「繫念心住，晝夜歡喜，正念思惟是呪章句，發菩提心。
analyzed: 「繫念心住，晝夜歡喜，正念思惟是呪章句，發菩提心。
translated: Fix your mind in mindfulness, joyfully abiding day and night, contemplating and reciting this mantra, giving rise to the bodhi mind.

original: 若眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說呪者為是等故於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典，令不斷絕。
analyzed: 若眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說呪者為是等故於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典，令不斷絕。
translated: If sentient beings have planted various roots of goodness in the presence of hundreds of thousands of buddhas, then those who recite this mantra will, for their sake, widely proclaim and spread this wonderful sutra in Jambudvipa, causing it not to be cut off.

original: 是諸眾生聽是呪已，於未來世無量百千那由他劫當在天上人中受樂，值是諸佛，速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉畢無餘。
analyzed: 是諸眾生聽是呪已，於未來世無量百千那由他劫當在天上人中受樂，值是諸佛，速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉畢無餘。
translated: Those sentient beings who have heard this mantra will, in future lives, for innumerable hundreds of thousands of kotis of kalpas, enjoy happiness among humans and gods, encounter these buddhas, quickly attain supreme perfect enlightenment, and completely exhaust the sufferings of the three evil paths without remainder.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

translated: Beings of equal practice and those with middling wholesome roots should uphold, recite, and master this. For seven days and nights, uphold the eight precepts, and in the morning and evening, with a pure mind, make offerings of incense and flowers to the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: 當為己身及諸眾生迴向具足阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，作是誓願：
analyzed: 當為己身及諸眾生迴向具足阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，作是誓願：
translated: For the sake of oneself and all sentient beings, one should dedicate and perfect supreme, perfect enlightenment, and make this vow:

original: 『令我所求皆得吉祥。
analyzed: 『令我所求皆得吉祥。
translated: 'May all that I seek be auspicious.'

original: 』自於所居房舍屋宅淨潔掃除——若自住處、若阿蘭若處——以香泥塗地，燒微妙香，敷淨好座，以種種華香布散其地，以待於我。
analyzed: 』自於所居房舍屋宅淨潔掃除——若自住處、若阿蘭若處——以香泥塗地，燒微妙香，敷淨好座，以種種華香布散其地，以待於我。
translated: In one's own dwelling place, whether it is one's own residence or a solitary place, one should sweep it clean, anoint the ground with fragrant mud, burn exquisite incense, set out a pure and fine seat, and scatter various flowers and incense on the ground to await me.

original: 我於爾時如一念頃入其室宅，即坐其座，從此日夜令此居家——若村邑、若僧房、若露處——無所乏少，若錢、若金、若珍寶、若牛羊、若穀米，一切所須即得具足，悉受快樂。
analyzed: 我於爾時如一念頃入其室宅，即坐其座，從此日夜令此居家——若村邑、若僧房、若露處——無所乏少，若錢、若金、若珍寶、若牛羊、若穀米，一切所須即得具足，悉受快樂。
translated: At that time, in an instant, I will enter your dwelling, sit on the seat, and from that day and night on, cause this household, whether it is a village, a monastery, or an open place, to lack nothing, whether it is money, gold, precious treasures, cows, sheep, or grain. Whatever is needed will be fully obtained, and all will experience happiness.

original: 「若能以己所作善根最勝之分迴與我者，我當終身不違其人，於所住處至心護念，隨心所求令得成就。
analyzed: 「若能以己所作善根最勝之分迴與我者，我當終身不違其人，於所住處至心護念，隨心所求令得成就。
translated: If you can take the most excellent portion of your own wholesome roots and dedicate them to me, I will never go against that person for the rest of my life. I will wholeheartedly protect and think of them in the place where they reside, and cause them to accomplish whatever they seek in their hearts.

original: 「並當至心禮如是等諸佛世尊——其名曰寶勝如來、無垢熾寶光明王相如來、金焰光明如來、金百光明照藏如來、金山寶蓋如來、金焰光相如來、大炬如來、寶相如來……；
analyzed: 「並當至心禮如是等諸佛世尊——其名曰寶勝如來、無垢熾寶光明王相如來、金焰光明如來、金百光明照藏如來、金山寶蓋如來、金焰光相如來、大炬如來、寶相如來……；
translated: You should all wholeheartedly pay homage to these Buddhas, whose names are: Ratnasaṃbhava Tathāgata, Vimalaprabhāsa-rāja-lakṣaṇa Tathāgata, Kancanaprabhāsa Tathāgata, Kanaka-śata-prabhāsa-prabhāsa-garbha Tathāgata, Kanaka-meru-ratna-chattra Tathāgata, Kanaka-arcci-lakṣaṇa Tathāgata, Mahā-ketu Tathāgata, Ratna-lakṣaṇa Tathāgata...;

original: 亦應敬禮信相菩薩、金光明菩薩、金藏菩薩、常悲菩薩、法上菩薩；
analyzed: 亦應敬禮信相菩薩、金光明菩薩、金藏菩薩、常悲菩薩、法上菩薩；
translated: You should also pay homage to the Bodhisattvas, namely: Sthira-bhūmi Bodhisattva, Suvarṇa-prabhāsa Bodhisattva, Suvarṇa-garbha Bodhisattva, Sadā-karuṇa Bodhisattva, Dharma-śreṣṭha Bodhisattva;

original: 亦應禮敬東方阿閦如來、南方寶相如來、西方無量壽佛、北方微妙聲佛。
analyzed: 亦應禮敬東方阿閦如來、南方寶相如來、西方無量壽佛、北方微妙聲佛。
translated: You should also pay homage to Akṣobhya Tathāgata in the East, Ratnasaṃbhava Tathāgata in the South, Amitāyus Buddha in the West, and Ghoṣa-svara-rāja Buddha in the North.

original: 功德天像法功德天像法「取未嫁女年十五者織絹一丈四尺，用功德天大身呪呪黃牛尿一千八遍，以尿洒其絹面上。
analyzed: 功德天像法功德天像法「取未嫁女年十五者織絹一丈四尺，用功德天大身呪呪黃牛尿一千八遍，以尿洒其絹面上。
translated: The Method of the Image of the Goddess of Merits The Method of the Image of the Goddess of Merits: Take silk cloth of a virgin girl aged fifteen, one zhang and four chi long, and use the great body mantra of the Goddess of Merits to incant yellow cow urine one thousand and eight times, and sprinkle it on the surface of the cloth.

original: 從月八日至十四日，淨好泥地，作四肘水壇，取釋迦像一軀安置壇中，供養種種香華飲食，然燈五盞。
analyzed: 從月八日至十四日，淨好泥地，作四肘水壇，取釋迦像一軀安置壇中，供養種種香華飲食，然燈五盞。
translated: From the eighth to the fourteenth day of the month, purify the ground with mud, make a water altar four cubits in size, take one statue of Shakyamuni and place it in the altar, make offerings of various incense, flowers, food and drink, and light five lamps.

original: 「喚一畫師——上好手者——日日與受八戒齋，清淨洒浴，亦與畫師作護身印。
analyzed: 「喚一畫師——上好手者——日日與受八戒齋，清淨洒浴，亦與畫師作護身印。
translated: Call a painter - a very skilled one - and have him observe the eight precepts every day, purify himself by bathing, and also make a protective hand seal for the painter.

original: 先共畫師斷其功力，隨所須者，呪師不得違價。
analyzed: 先共畫師斷其功力，隨所須者，呪師不得違價。
translated: First, discuss the amount of work and the necessary expenses with the painter, and the mantra practitioner should not go back on the agreed price.

original: 「其像身長一肘——一尺三寸五分——除其光座，更須高大，亦彌精好。
analyzed: 「其像身長一肘——一尺三寸五分——除其光座，更須高大，亦彌精好。
translated: The length of the statue is one cubit - one chi and three cun and five fen - excluding the light seat, it should be taller and more refined.

original: 用薰陸香、沈水香、白檀香乳汁和彩色，不得用諸皮膠，以功德天華身呪呪其彩色。
analyzed: 用薰陸香、沈水香、白檀香乳汁和彩色，不得用諸皮膠，以功德天華身呪呪其彩色。
translated: Use olibanum, aloeswood, and white sandalwood mixed with color, do not use any animal glue, and use the mantra of the meritorious heavenly body to enchant the colors.

original: 取五罐水著壇中心及四角，於壇門前作三七人齋——若無者，七人、乃至三人亦得。
analyzed: 取五罐水著壇中心及四角，於壇門前作三七人齋——若無者，七人、乃至三人亦得。
translated: Take five jars of water and place them in the center and four corners of the altar. In front of the altar door, prepare a feast for three times seven people - if there are none, seven people or even three people are also acceptable.

original: 「其功德天像，身端正，赤白色，二臂畫作種種纓絡、環釧、耳璫、天衣、寶冠。
analyzed: 「其功德天像，身端正，赤白色，二臂畫作種種纓絡、環釧、耳璫、天衣、寶冠。
translated: The image of the meritorious heavenly maiden should have an upright body, a reddish-white complexion, two arms, and be painted with various necklaces, bracelets, earrings, heavenly garments, and a jeweled crown.

original: 天女左手持如意珠，右手施呪無畏，宣臺上坐。
analyzed: 天女左手持如意珠，右手施呪無畏，宣臺上坐。
translated: In the left hand of the heavenly maiden, she holds a wish-fulfilling jewel, and with the right hand she bestows the fearlessness of the mantra, sitting on a high dais.

original: 「左邊畫梵摩天，手執寶鏡；
analyzed: 「左邊畫梵摩天，手執寶鏡；
translated: On the left side, paint Brahma holding a jeweled mirror;

original: 右邊畫帝釋天，如散華供養天女。
analyzed: 右邊畫帝釋天，如散華供養天女。
translated: on the right side, paint Indra scattering flowers as an offering to the heavenly maiden.

original: 背後各畫一七寶山，於天像上作五色雲，雲上安六牙白象，象鼻絞馬腦瓶，瓶中傾出種種寶物罐於功德天頂上。
analyzed: 背後各畫一七寶山，於天像上作五色雲，雲上安六牙白象，象鼻絞馬腦瓶，瓶中傾出種種寶物罐於功德天頂上。
translated: Behind each, paint a seven-jeweled mountain. Above the heavenly images, make five-colored clouds. Above the clouds, place a six-tusked white elephant. The elephant's trunk wraps around a horse's brain bottle. In the bottle, pour out various precious substances. Place a vase on top of the head of the Goddess of Merits.

original: 「天神背後畫百寶華林，頭上畫作千葉寶蓋，蓋上作諸天伎樂，散華供養。
analyzed: 「天神背後畫百寶華林，頭上畫作千葉寶蓋，蓋上作諸天伎樂，散華供養。
translated: Behind the heavenly spirit, paint a hundred jeweled flower forests. Above the head, paint a thousand-petaled jeweled canopy. Above the canopy, make heavenly musical instruments, scatter flowers, and make offerings.

original: 「其像底下右邊復畫作呪師形，著鮮白衣，手把香鑪，胡跪供養，於白素紬上坐。
analyzed: 「其像底下右邊復畫作呪師形，著鮮白衣，手把香鑪，胡跪供養，於白素紬上坐。
translated: Below the image, on the right side, again paint the appearance of the mantra master, wearing fresh white clothes, holding an incense burner in the hand, kneeling to make offerings, sitting on white silk brocade.

original: 「以上功德天像法竟。
analyzed: 「以上功德天像法竟。
translated: The method of the image of the Goddess of Merits is completed above.

original: 「又一像法，劫賓木作一天女形，身長一寸。
analyzed: 「又一像法，劫賓木作一天女形，身長一寸。
translated: Another image method: make the appearance of a heavenly maiden with kāpilla wood, one inch tall.

original: 「呪師從正月一日洗浴，當於像前設種種供養，日日更加上好供具，如是至十五日滿足，所欲求者皆得稱意。
analyzed: 「呪師從正月一日洗浴，當於像前設種種供養，日日更加上好供具，如是至十五日滿足，所欲求者皆得稱意。
translated: The mantra practitioner, from the first day of the first month, should bathe and set up various offerings in front of the image, adding better and better offerings day by day, like this until the fifteenth day is fulfilled, and whatever is sought will all be accomplished according to one's wishes.

original: 「欲散壇時，於壇中心燒阿波末唎伽草此云牛膝草是。
analyzed: 「欲散壇時，於壇中心燒阿波末唎伽草此云牛膝草是。
translated: When wishing to dismantle the altar, in the center of the altar, burn Apamārīka grass (this is called ox knee grass).

original: 「若欲作法時，正月、三月、七月，當以此月入壇，天女歡喜，餘月並不得。
analyzed: 「若欲作法時，正月、三月、七月，當以此月入壇，天女歡喜，餘月並不得。
translated: If wishing to perform the ritual, in the first, third, and seventh months, one should enter the altar in these months, and celestial maidens will rejoice, but in other months, it is not allowed.

original: 「若欲伏大力鬼時，先燒阿唎瑟迦二合柴此云木患子是。
analyzed: 「若欲伏大力鬼時，先燒阿唎瑟迦二合柴此云木患子是。
translated: If wishing to subdue powerful ghosts, first burn Alikasaka firewood (this is called jujube wood).

original: 「又法，呪君杜嚕香薰陸香是、尼俱陀樹葉、種種香華。
analyzed: 「又法，呪君杜嚕香薰陸香是、尼俱陀樹葉、種種香華。
translated: Another method is to use mantra to fumigate jun dūru incense (this is frankincense), niqūtā tree leaves, and various fragrant flowers.

original: 又以黃牛蘇然燈，每恒如是，取前件花果誦呪一百八遍，一遍一度擲著火中。
analyzed: 又以黃牛蘇然燈，每恒如是，取前件花果誦呪一百八遍，一遍一度擲著火中。
translated: Also, using yellow cow ghee to light lamps, always like this, take the aforementioned flowers and fruits, recite the mantra one hundred and eight times, and each time throw them into the fire.

original: 一日三度，十五日滿足，出道場訖，一切財寶、種種衣裳、五穀豐盈，無所乏少。
analyzed: 一日三度，十五日滿足，出道場訖，一切財寶、種種衣裳、五穀豐盈，無所乏少。
translated: Do this three times a day for fifteen days, and when you finish the ritual arena, all wealth, various clothes, and the five grains will be abundant, and you will have nothing lacking.

original: 「又法，所有病人身上一切痛處，皆以烏羊毛繩結作二十一結，繫安痛處即得除愈。
analyzed: 「又法，所有病人身上一切痛處，皆以烏羊毛繩結作二十一結，繫安痛處即得除愈。
translated: Another method: For all pain in the body of a sick person, tie a rope made of black sheep's wool into twenty-one knots and tie it to the painful spot, and they will be cured.

original: 「又法，向病人床底每夜燒摩那屎囉此云雄黃并白芥子、鹽等，鬼聞藥氣而身劈裂，退散馳走。
analyzed: 「又法，向病人床底每夜燒摩那屎囉此云雄黃并白芥子、鹽等，鬼聞藥氣而身劈裂，退散馳走。
translated: Another method: Every night burn realgar and white mustard seeds, salt, etc. under the bed of the sick person. The ghosts, smelling the medicine's aroma, will split open their bodies and flee in all directions.

original: 「又法，取瞿嚧者那此云牛黃、須曼華此云相思是擣為末，呪之一百八遍，塗著額上前，一切障難自然散滅。
analyzed: 「又法，取瞿嚧者那此云牛黃、須曼華此云相思是擣為末，呪之一百八遍，塗著額上前，一切障難自然散滅。
translated: Another method: Take ox bezoar and sumana flowers, pound them into powder, recite the mantra one hundred and eight times, and apply it to the forehead. All obstacles will naturally disappear.

original: 「又法，取丁香葉、龍腦擣為末，呪之一千八遍，用塗心上，又取一分以緋袋宬之安頂上，一切眾生見者愛敬念。
analyzed: 「又法，取丁香葉、龍腦擣為末，呪之一千八遍，用塗心上，又取一分以緋袋宬之安頂上，一切眾生見者愛敬念。
translated: Furthermore, take cloves and camphor leaves, pound them into powder, incant them 1,080 times, apply them to the heart, and take a portion to put in a red bag and place it on the crown of the head. All sentient beings who see it will love and respect it.

original: 「若欲令怨家病時，當於功德天像前立一肘水壇。
analyzed: 「若欲令怨家病時，當於功德天像前立一肘水壇。
translated: If you wish to cause an enemy to become ill, in front of the image of the Goddess of Merit, set up a water altar one cubit in size.

original: 壇門邊燒却陀囉木此云紫檀木是，又取市死人臂骨、野芥子、訶梨勒燒作灰，乳汁和，畫作彼怨人形像。
analyzed: 壇門邊燒却陀囉木此云紫檀木是，又取市死人臂骨、野芥子、訶梨勒燒作灰，乳汁和，畫作彼怨人形像。
translated: At the edge of the altar door, burn sandalwood (this is called purple sandalwood). Also take the arm bone of a person who died in the market, wild mustard seeds, and harītakī, burn them into ashes, mix them with milk, and draw the form of the enemy.

original: 呪師誦呪，以右手把刀，左手執持，作瞋心誦呪一百八遍。
analyzed: 呪師誦呪，以右手把刀，左手執持，作瞋心誦呪一百八遍。
translated: The mantra master recites the mantra, holds a knife in his right hand, and holds it in his left hand, with an angry mind, reciting the mantra 108 times.

original: 又以左脚蹋畫人心上二十一遍，呪時加𤙖㧊。
analyzed: 又以左脚蹋畫人心上二十一遍，呪時加𤙖㧊。
translated: Also step on the heart of the drawn enemy with the left foot 21 times. When reciting the mantra, add hūṃ and jī.

original: 「又法，呪師若欲得一切眾生自來供養者，當於功德天像前立二肘水壇，當壇西門穿一肘火坑。
analyzed: 「又法，呪師若欲得一切眾生自來供養者，當於功德天像前立二肘水壇，當壇西門穿一肘火坑。
translated: Moreover, if the mantra practitioner wishes to cause all beings to come and make offerings to him, he should set up a two-cubit water altar in front of the image of the Goddess of Merits, and dig a one-cubit fire pit at the west gate of the altar.

original: 呪師於壇門南坐，右手把方鹽一百八顆，一顆呪一遍，擲火爐中。
analyzed: 呪師於壇門南坐，右手把方鹽一百八顆，一顆呪一遍，擲火爐中。
translated: The mantra practitioner sits to the south of the altar gate, holds a square salt stone in his right hand, recites the mantra once for each grain, and throws it into the fire stove.

original: 如是十五日，一日三時，一時一千八遍，并燒酥蜜、白膠、沈水、蘇合香等，百味飲食自來供養，呪師無所乏少。
analyzed: 如是十五日，一日三時，一時一千八遍，并燒酥蜜、白膠、沈水、蘇合香等，百味飲食自來供養，呪師無所乏少。
translated: In this way, for fifteen days, three times a day, one thousand and eight times each time, and burns ghee, honey, white lacquer, agarwood, frankincense, and other incense, and all kinds of food and drink will come to make offerings, and the mantra practitioner will have nothing lacking.

original: 「又法，若欲得見功德天者，當詣一大蓮花池，可以左手執香鑪入蓮華池，於其池中摘取一華，呪之一遍還擲著水中。
analyzed: 「又法，若欲得見功德天者，當詣一大蓮花池，可以左手執香鑪入蓮華池，於其池中摘取一華，呪之一遍還擲著水中。
translated: Moreover, if one wishes to see the Goddess of Merits, one should go to a large lotus pond, take a censer in one's left hand, enter the lotus pond, pick a flower from the pond, recite the mantra once, and throw it back into the water.

original: 如是滿一萬遍訖，爾時功德天當於七寶座以自相好水中出現。
analyzed: 如是滿一萬遍訖，爾時功德天當於七寶座以自相好水中出現。
translated: In this way, when ten thousand recitations are completed, at that time, the merit-making celestial will appear in the water with her own marks on a seat of the seven treasures.

original: 爾時，行者以銀盋滿中盛龍腦香水，於其出處以水潑之。
analyzed: 爾時，行者以銀盋滿中盛龍腦香水，於其出處以水潑之。
translated: At that time, the practitioner should fill a silver bowl with dragon brain perfume and sprinkle the water where she appears.

original: 於是功德天而作是言：
analyzed: 於是功德天而作是言：
translated: Then, the merit-making celestial will say:

original: 『子欲令我作何等物？
analyzed: 『子欲令我作何等物？
translated: Child, what do you want me to do?

original: 』爾時，行者即答：
analyzed: 』爾時，行者即答：
translated: At that time, the practitioner should reply:

original: 『功德天神減少分施我。
analyzed: 『功德天神減少分施我。
translated: Merit-making celestial, please give me a share.

original: 』作是語已，功德天即自還去。
analyzed: 』作是語已，功德天即自還去。
translated: After saying this, the merit-making celestial will return by herself.

original: 於後行者去處皆值財寶，求者稱意，種種隨心終不乏少。
analyzed: 於後行者去處皆值財寶，求者稱意，種種隨心終不乏少。
translated: Afterwards, wherever the practitioner goes, he will encounter wealth and treasures, and whatever he seeks will be to his satisfaction, and he will never lack anything.

original: 「又法，取貰彌木此云狗杞是也，寸截一百八段，呪一遍擲著火中。
analyzed: 「又法，取貰彌木此云狗杞是也，寸截一百八段，呪一遍擲著火中。
translated: Another method is to take dogwood wood, cut it into one hundred and eight segments, and recite the mantra once for each piece thrown into the fire.

original: 每日三時，一時一百八遍，如是滿足一百八日，於是行者即得自悟三通智。
analyzed: 每日三時，一時一百八遍，如是滿足一百八日，於是行者即得自悟三通智。
translated: Three times a day, one hundred and eight times each time, in this way completing one hundred and eight days. Then the practitioner will immediately attain the wisdom of the three knowledges.

original: 「又法，或在寺中、若在房中、有舍利處、莊嚴道場，以功德天像面向西著，寸截紫檀木、任婆木皮此云苦楝，是二種物悉以酪、酥、蜜塗，塗一段木呪之一遍擲著火中，如是滿一百八段乃止。
analyzed: 「又法，或在寺中、若在房中、有舍利處、莊嚴道場，以功德天像面向西著，寸截紫檀木、任婆木皮此云苦楝，是二種物悉以酪、酥、蜜塗，塗一段木呪之一遍擲著火中，如是滿一百八段乃止。
translated: Another method, either in a temple, or in a room, where there are relics, adorn the ritual arena, place the image of the Merit Goddess facing west, cut a piece of purple sandalwood, or the bark of the nimba tree, these two kinds of objects are all smeared with curd, ghee, and honey, smear a piece of wood and recite it once, throw it into the fire, in this way complete one hundred and eight pieces and then stop.

original: 一日三時，如是二十一日，行者日得銀錢五百文。
analyzed: 一日三時，如是二十一日，行者日得銀錢五百文。
translated: Three times a day, in this way for twenty-one days, the practitioner will daily obtain five hundred silver coins.

original: 「又法，取優鉢羅華——若無此華，取初出青蓮華——舍利波尼、鞞沙多波尼、摩陀那香、摩盧伽香、摩那叱囉，以上六種等分擣作末，以雪水和作丸，丸如小棗大，於金銀合子重宬藥丸，依如前法日夜誦呪不息，乃至藥自然動。
analyzed: 「又法，取優鉢羅華——若無此華，取初出青蓮華——舍利波尼、鞞沙多波尼、摩陀那香、摩盧伽香、摩那叱囉，以上六種等分擣作末，以雪水和作丸，丸如小棗大，於金銀合子重宬藥丸，依如前法日夜誦呪不息，乃至藥自然動。
translated: Furthermore, take uḍumbara flowers - if these flowers are not available, take newly emerged blue lotus flowers - śāriparṇī, viśataparṇī, madhuka fragrance, mallika fragrance, and mānasāra, with these six types taken in equal parts, pound them into powder, mix with snow water to make pills, the size of small jujubes, and store the pill medicine in a gold or silver container. Relying on the previous method, recite the mantra day and night without rest, until the medicine naturally moves.

original: 動，即以藥擲著口中，行者含訖，一切見者皆大歡喜，日行三千里可無所畏。
analyzed: 動，即以藥擲著口中，行者含訖，一切見者皆大歡喜，日行三千里可無所畏。
translated: When it moves, immediately throw the medicine into the mouth. After the practitioner has held it, everyone who sees it will be greatly delighted, and they can travel three thousand li a day without fear.

original: 「又法，欲得功德天每恒歡喜者，取那伽枳薩此云龍華，出崑崙山、須慰多、摩伽羅尼三種等分擣為末，以雪水和藥為丸，丸如小棗大，以金合子宬藥，每日於功德天像前燒一丸，一切障難自然散滅。
analyzed: 「又法，欲得功德天每恒歡喜者，取那伽枳薩此云龍華，出崑崙山、須慰多、摩伽羅尼三種等分擣為末，以雪水和藥為丸，丸如小棗大，以金合子宬藥，每日於功德天像前燒一丸，一切障難自然散滅。
translated: Furthermore, if one wishes to always delight Goddess of Blessings, take naga-kesara (dragon flower), which grows on Kunlun Mountain, suvida, and magalani, mix them in equal parts and pound them into powder, mix with snow water to make pills, the size of small jujubes, store the pills in a golden container, and burn one pill in front of the image of Goddess of Blessings every day. All obstacles and difficulties will naturally disappear.

original: 「又法，以舍離沙此云合歡樹一肘，麁如指大，以娑羅樹汁塗合歡枝上。
analyzed: 「又法，以舍離沙此云合歡樹一肘，麁如指大，以娑羅樹汁塗合歡枝上。
translated: Furthermore, take a branch of sha-li-sha (bougainvillea), one cubit long, as thick as a finger, and smear it with the sap of a shala tree.

original: 呪師手執枝，於天像前數數誦呪，滿一百八日，天女歡喜，所有患處以此呪杖拄之即愈。
analyzed: 呪師手執枝，於天像前數數誦呪，滿一百八日，天女歡喜，所有患處以此呪杖拄之即愈。
translated: The mantra practitioner holds the branch in their hand, recites the mantra in front of the celestial image repeatedly, and completes 108 days. The celestial maiden will be delighted, and any afflicted areas will be cured by tapping them with this mantra staff.

original: 「又法，須取穀、麥、小豆，呪之一遍擲著火中，令滿一千八遍。

analyzed: 一日三時，如是滿足四十五日，一切家中穀、麥、豆自然色別皆來聚集。
translated: Three times a day, in this way, for forty-five days, all the grains, wheat, and beans in the house naturally come together, each with its own color.

original: 「又法，欲除家內一切災禍，取伽羅樹枝——若無此木，取石榴枝——寸截，塗酥、酪、蜜呪之一遍，著火中燒滿一千八遍，一切災禍自然除滅。
analyzed: 「又法，欲除家內一切災禍，取伽羅樹枝——若無此木，取石榴枝——寸截，塗酥、酪、蜜呪之一遍，著火中燒滿一千八遍，一切災禍自然除滅。
translated: Moreover, if you wish to remove all calamities in the house, take a branch of the kāla tree - if there is no such wood, take a branch of the pomegranate tree - cut it into one-inch sections, smear it with ghee, curd, and honey, recite the mantra once, and burn it in the fire for one thousand and eight times. All calamities will naturally be removed.

original: 「又法，為除家內一切災障，每月八日、十五日，炭、灰二物和酪，呪之一百八遍，散宅四方。
analyzed: 「又法，為除家內一切災障，每月八日、十五日，炭、灰二物和酪，呪之一百八遍，散宅四方。
translated: Moreover, in order to remove all calamities and obstacles in the house, on the eighth and fifteenth days of each month, mix charcoal and ash with curd, recite the mantra one hundred and eight times, and scatter it in the four directions of the house.

original: 當宅中立，誦呪一千八遍，一切惡鬼不敢前進。
analyzed: 當宅中立，誦呪一千八遍，一切惡鬼不敢前進。
translated: Stand in the middle of the house and recite the mantra one thousand and eight times. All evil ghosts will not dare to move forward.

original: 「呪師欲得天女歡喜者，於像前作四肘水壇，壇中心穿一肘火坑，深七寸，畫作十二葉蓮華形，於中燒紫檀木、桑木，柴長一肘，各一束。
analyzed: 「呪師欲得天女歡喜者，於像前作四肘水壇，壇中心穿一肘火坑，深七寸，畫作十二葉蓮華形，於中燒紫檀木、桑木，柴長一肘，各一束。
translated: If the mantra practitioner wishes to delight the celestial maiden, in front of the image, make a water altar of four cubits, in the center of the altar dig a fire pit of one cubit, seven inches deep, draw it in the shape of a lotus with twelve petals, in it burn sandalwood and mulberry wood, each bundle one cubit long.

original: 如是，每日三度於像前燒之，種種供養，并燒酥酪、粳米華、蕎麥華，誦大身呪至十萬遍。
analyzed: 如是，每日三度於像前燒之，種種供養，并燒酥酪、粳米華、蕎麥華，誦大身呪至十萬遍。
translated: In this way, three times a day in front of the image burn it, make various offerings, and also burn ghee, rice, and buckwheat flowers, recite the great body mantra until it reaches one hundred thousand times.

original: 依如此法，天女歡喜，恒具大驗。
analyzed: 依如此法，天女歡喜，恒具大驗。
translated: In accordance with this method, the celestial maiden will be delighted and will always possess great efficacy.

original: 「誦此呪不得行欲。
analyzed: 「誦此呪不得行欲。
translated: One who recites this mantra should not engage in sexual activity.

original: 「誦此呪者得無所畏，若阿須輪、鬼神、龍神無能害者。
analyzed: 「誦此呪者得無所畏，若阿須輪、鬼神、龍神無能害者。
translated: One who recites this mantra will attain fearlessness, and no asura, ghost, or dragon god will be able to harm them.

original: 」說此呪已，阿難及諸比丘皆前為佛作禮而退。
analyzed: 」說此呪已，阿難及諸比丘皆前為佛作禮而退。
translated: Having spoken this mantra, Ānanda and the bhikṣus all came forward, bowed to the Buddha, and withdrew.
